MS MCQs

    Implement hybrid backup and recovery with Windows Server IaaS

    »

    1. Larissa is responsible for implementing server workload backups at Contoso. She wants to implement on-premises backups to an Azure Recovery Vault service. What does Larissa need to do on the Windows Servers she wants to back up?

      Larissa must download and install the MARS agent, and then register the server by installing the vault credentials.

      Larissa must download and install the MARS agent.

      Larissa doesn’t need to do anything. Windows Servers contain the required agent for inclusion in the Recovery Vault service.


    2. After creating Contoso’s Recovery Vault service, Larissa discovers that she wants to change the storage replication type to locally redundant. In which situations can Larissa change the storage replication type?

      Larissa can change this setting at any time.

      Larissa can change this setting, but only before a Recovery Vault service starts providing protection for items.

      Larissa cannot change this setting at any time.


    3. Larissa has been archiving and tidying unneeded backup data. She has just removed some backup data from Azure Backup. She’s just been informed that this removed data is required to restore some damaged files. What are Larissa’s options?

      Larissa can do nothing about it. The backup data is unrecoverable.

      Larissa can recover the removed backup data for up to 14 days after deletion.

      Larissa can recover the removed backup data for up to 21 days after deletion.
